channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Inside Visual Studio: Improving Open-Source Workflows with vcpkg】Visual Studio 内部：使用 vcpkg 改进开源工作流程
item.description: 【vcpkg, an open-source C/C++ package manager maintained by Microsoft, is increasingly recognized as a leading dependency management solution. As an enterprise-grade tool, it enables organizations to streamline library imports, reduce duplication, and support flexible, reproducible builds acros】vcpkg 是 Microsoft 维护的开源 C/C++ 包管理器，越来越被认为是领先的依赖管理解决方案。作为企业级工具，它使组织能够简化库导入、减少重复并支持灵活、可重复的构建 acros

item.title: 【From Real-Time Analytics to AI: Your Azure Cosmos DB & DocumentDB Agenda for Microsoft Ignite 2025】从实时分析到 AI：Microsoft Ignite 2025 的 Azure Cosmos DB 和 DocumentDB 议程
item.description: 【Microsoft Ignite 2025 is your opportunity to explore how Azure Cosmos DB, Cosmos DB in Microsoft Fabric, and DocumentDB power the next ge】Microsoft Ignite 2025 为您提供了探索 Azure Cosmos DB、Microsoft Fabric 中的 Cosmos DB 和 DocumentDB 如何为下一代提供动力的机会

item.title: 【Troubleshooting recent MIDI issues in Windows 11 (and Windows 10)】解决 Windows 11（和 Windows 10）中最近的 MIDI 问题
item.description: 【If you are on Windows 11 (or Windows 10 for the UAD issue) and recently had either of these two issues, please read on: You use a Universal Audio (UAD) device and found that all or most of your MIDI devices are no longer recognized in your DAW in Windows 11 or Windows 10 You have a new MIDI 2.0 (UMP Data Format – mo】如果您使用的是 Windows 11（或针对 UAD 问题的 Windows 10）并且最近遇到了这两个问题中的任何一个，请继续阅读：您使用通用音频 (UAD) 设备，发现所有或大部分 MIDI 设备在 Windows 11 或 Windows 10 中的 DAW 中不再被识别您有一个新的 MIDI 2.0（UMP 数据格式 – mo）

item.title: 【Non-recursively deleting a binary tree in constant space: Synthesizing the parent pointer】非递归删除常量空间中的二叉树：合成父指针
item.description: 【Last time, we looked at a way to delete a binary tree non-recursively, assuming that we had parent pointers. But nodes in a classical binary tree does not remember t】上次，我们研究了一种非递归删除二叉树的方法，假设我们有父指针。但经典二叉树中的节点不记得 t

item.title: 【Open Source AI Editor: Second Milestone】开源人工智能编辑器：第二个里程碑
item.description: 【Ghost text suggestions are now open source as part of the Copilot Chat extension - the second milestone in making VS Code an open source AI editor. Read the full article】Ghost 文本建议现已开源，作为 Copilot Chat 扩展的一部分 - 这是使 VS Code 成为开源 AI 编辑器的第二个里程碑。阅读全文

item.title: 【Roadmap for AI in Visual Studio (November)】Visual Studio 中的 AI 路线图（11 月）
item.description: 【Today, we’re excited to share our public roadmap, which outlines the next steps in evolving Visual Studio with AI-powered agentic experiences. With every month, we aim to deliver smarter, faster, and more intuitive tools that enhance your coding experience. Disclaimer: The items outlined here represent ongoing work for the month. They】今天，我们很高兴分享我们的公共路线图，其中概述了通过人工智能驱动的代理体验发展 Visual Studio 的后续步骤。我们每个月都致力于提供更智能、更快速、更直观的工具来增强您的编码体验。免责声明：此处概述的项目代表本月正在进行的工作。他们

item.title: 【How Copilot Studio uses .NET and WebAssembly for performance and innovation】Copilot Studio 如何使用 .NET 和 WebAssembly 来实现性能和创新
item.description: 【Microsoft Copilot Studio is at the forefront of conversational AI and automation, empowering organizations to build, customize, and manage intelligent copilots and bots for a wide range of enterprise scenarios. As the platform has evolved, so too have the t】Microsoft Copilot Studio 处于对话式 AI 和自动化领域的前沿，使组织能够为各种企业场景构建、定制和管理智能副驾驶和机器人。随着平台的发展，技术也在不断发展

item.title: 【Non-recursively deleting a binary tree in constant space: Traversal with parent pointers】非递归删除常量空间中的二叉树：用父指针遍历
item.description: 【As a challenge, a colleague of mine told me to find a non-recursive constant-space algorithm for deleting a binary tree.¹ After a moment's thought, I was able to come up with an algorithm. It is often the case that solving a problem is easier once you are told that a solution exists. When I asked the Internet for a non-recu】作为一项挑战，我的一位同事告诉我找到一种用于删除二叉树的非递归常量空间算法。经过片刻的思考，我想出了一个算法。通常情况下，一旦您被告知存在解决方案，解决问题就会变得更容易。当我在网上询问非recu时

item.title: 【Now Available: Sort Geospatial Query Results by ST_Distance in Azure Cosmos DB】现已推出：在 Azure Cosmos DB 中按 ST_Distance 对地理空间查询结果进行排序
item.description: 【Azure Cosmos DB’s geospatial capabilities just got even better! We're excited to announce that you can now sort query results by distance using an ORDER BY ST_DISTANCE(...) clause in the NoSQL query language while leveraging a spatial index. [video width="1920】Azure Cosmos DB 的地理空间功能变得更加出色！我们很高兴地宣布，您现在可以在利用空间索引的同时，使用 NoSQL 查询语言中的 ORDER BY ST_DISTANCE(...) 子句按距离对查询结果进行排序。 [视频宽度=1920
